value.name: Iowa police chase doughnut van
value.description: Authorities finally cornered it in neighboring Tama County. Frank Alvarado, 46, of Moline, Ill., was charged with theft and other counts and was held on $15,000 bond. Security video showed Alvarado milling about before driving off in the van, but he was ...

value.name: Activists: Police killings of Latinos lack attention
value.description: It’s like they don’t care about Latinos and the racism we face, said Frank Alvarado, Sr., 76, a retired U.S. Marine whose son was shot multiple times by Salinas, California, police in 2014 ...
